QuestData.Title: Straight to the Top
QuestData.Description:
There appears to be something sapping the arcane energies at the apex of the tower.
Now that you've stabilized the energies down here, you should be able to "ride" the arcane magics in the area.
Look in that bag of yours for something called an arcane stepping stone, and use it to meet me at the top.
QuestData.LogDescription: Look through the Bag of Helpful Goods for the Arcane Stepping Stone, then use at an arcane focus point to reach the top of the Azure Archives.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Kalecgos at the top of the Azure Archives.
QuestData.RewardText: It's a bit worse up here than I had anticipated!
